tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airport_code INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    wind_direction VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FlightLogs (
    flight_id INT,
    pilot_name VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_number VARCHAR,
    departure_location VARCHAR,
    arrival_location VARCHAR,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE pilot_info (
    pilot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    experience_years INT,
    license_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE wind_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT,
  wind_speed DECIMAL,
  wind_direction VARCHAR(10),
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flight_plans (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  departure VARCHAR(50),
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  planned_departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  planned_arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  airport_code VARCHAR(5),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  weather_condition VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE FlightPlans (
  flight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  departure_airport VARCHAR(5),
  arrival_airport VARCHAR(5),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PilotData (
  pilot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  experience_years INT,
  license_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE AircraftData (
  aircraft_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  model VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  max_speed FLOAT,
  max_altitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FlightLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_id UUID,
  pilot_id UUID,
  aircraft_id UUID,
  departure_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_datetime TIMESTAMP
)
